meeting_info.location: Council Chambers, 6th Floor, City Hall and via video conference

agenda_items.title: Approval of January 11, 2024 Charter Review Commission Meeting Minutes
agenda_items.description: Approval of the minutes from the previous meeting.

agenda_items.title: Delete Section on Urban Conservation Programs
agenda_items.description: Delete the section allowing the city council to provide urban conservation, rehabilitation, and redevelopment programs in Chapter XV § 2.

agenda_items.title: Rename Zoning Commission
agenda_items.description: Rename the Zoning Commission to the City Plan and Zoning Commission and allow that commission’s membership to contain a minimum of 15 residents in Chapter XV § 3.

agenda_items.title: Amend Process for Appointing Plan Commission Members
agenda_items.description: Amend the process for appointing the chair and members of the plan commission to reflect current practice in Chapter XV § 3.

agenda_items.title: Allow Boards and Commissions to Elect Vice Chairs
agenda_items.description: Allow city boards and commissions to elect their own vice chairs in Chapter IV § 5, Chapter XV § 3, Chapter XVII § 2, and Chapter XXIV § 13.

agenda_items.title: Remove Requirement for Thoroughfare Plan
agenda_items.description: Remove the requirement to have a Thoroughfare Plan from Chapter XV § 8.

agenda_items.title: Amend Language for City Secretary's Hiring Authority
agenda_items.description: Amend language within Chapter IIIA § 2 to allow the City Secretary the ability to hire all staff within their office.

agenda_items.title: Delete Requirement for Assistant City Attorneys
agenda_items.description: Delete the requirement that all assistant city attorneys shall devote their entire time to the service of the city in Chapter VII § 2.

agenda_items.title: Delete Provisions for Opening and Inspection of Bids
agenda_items.description: Delete provisions in Chapter XXII § 3 pertaining to the procedures for the opening and public inspection of bids.

agenda_items.title: Abolish or Amend Mayor Pro Tem Positions
agenda_items.description: Abolish the Mayor Pro Tem and Deputy Mayor Pro Tem positions or amend the appointment process of the Mayor Pro Tem and Deputy Mayor Pro Tem positions in Chapter III § 11.
